entry.title: Clustering in Maps v2 for Android
entry.content:
I’ve been working in a clustering code ready for Maps v2 , as I didn’t found any full example I could use in some of my apps.

So here you have it: a working example of Clustering in Maps v2 for Android for use in your projects.

All the setup instructions are in GitHub .

You are more than welcome to change things, report issues and make pull requests!

Some screenshots of the example project.
